Title: Occupation in 26 Pictures
Writer: Filip David (collaborator), Stipe Gurdulic (collaborator), Mato Jaksic (collaborator), Mirko Kovac, Ranko Munitic (collaborator), Lordan Zafranovic
Actors: Frano Lasic, Milan Strljic, Tanja Poberznik, Boris Kralj
Plot: Three young men - a Croat, an Italian, and a Jew - are the best friends in pre-WW2 Dubrovnik. When their country is occupied by Nazis and their cronies, the idyllic city becomes a place of terror and gruesome massacres. The friends must now take different sides in a global conflict.
Language: Serbo-Croatian, Italian, German, Russian, French, Latin
